text: Fra' Marco Luzzago (23 June 1950 â€“ 7 June 2022) was an Italian aristocat. He was the Lieutenant of the Grand Master and head of the Sovereign Military Order of Malta from 8 November 2020 to 7 June 2022. Luzzago died on 7 June 2022 near Macerata, Italy from a heart attack, aged 71. ==References== Category:1950 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Princes and Grand Masters of the Sovereign Military Order of Malta
title: Marco Luzzago
